title: Archetypes Configuration
description: Configuration for character archetypes defining combat roles, primary resources, and display metadata. Archetypes are permanent choices made during character creation that determine a character's fundamental combat identity.

$schema.description: Reference to the JSON schema file for validation

archetypes.description: List of archetype definitions. Exactly 4 archetypes are required.

archetypeDefinition.description: Core definition for a single archetype including display metadata, combat role, and resource type.

archetypeId.description: The archetype enum value. Must be one of the four defined archetypes.

tagline.description: Thematic tagline for the archetype (e.g., 'The Unyielding Bulwark')

description.description: Full description of the archetype's role and characteristics

selectionText.description: Flavor text for character creation selection in second-person perspective

primaryResource.description: Primary resource type used by this archetype

playstyleDescription.description: Brief playstyle guidance for the player

isPermanent.description: Whether the archetype choice is permanent. Must always be true.
